yea i just added it……

the mission Ice Ice is probably from his song of Ice Ice baby………

and he was dating Madona or however you spell her name at first…..mybe referring to hotsmuto

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
The references to Vanilla Ice for this character are astounding and numerous.
He is received from a mission called "Ice Ice," which includes a line taken from one of his songs, "Yo VIP, Let's Kick It." His jutsu is a blatant reference to the same song as the above mission, "Ice Ice Baby," he even ends a sentence "Word to your mother" in Tsukiyomi Ascendant.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I probably don't even have to say it, but it wasn't mentioned on the page.

He is also a reference to rapper Vanilla Ice.
